summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 FORD EDGE.  FREON WAS LEAKING FROM THE VEHICLE AND CAUSED THE CONTACT TO BECOME ILL.  SHE TOOK THE VEHICLE TO PEP BOYS AND THEY STATED THAT THE HEATER CORE WAS DEFECTIVE.  THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN REPAIRED OR TAKEN TO THE DEALER.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 4,600 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 3,600.
